mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM wishlist WHERE postid = #{postId} AND userid = #{userId}
SELECT p.*, m.imageUrl as mainImageUrl FROM Post p LEFT JOIN MainImage m ON p.postId = m.postId INNER JOIN Wishlist w ON p.postId = w.postId WHERE w.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY w.wishlistID DESC
